quoteText:
Company reserves the right to modify and
amend these Terms of Service at any time and without notice, and it is your
responsibility to review these Terms of Service for any changes.
Your use of
the Service following any amendment of these Terms of Service will signify your
assent to and acceptance of its revised terms.
title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: "Company reserves the right to modify and amend these Terms of Service at any time and without notice, and it is your responsibility to review these Terms of Service for any changes. Your use of the Service following any amendment of these Terms of Service will signify your assent to and acceptance of its revised terms."
